price: Ngunit tumalikod siya[587] kasabay ng kampon niya at nagsabi [tungkol kay Moises]: “Manggagaway o baliw.”
arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكۡنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَٰحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fatawallā biruk'nihi waqāla sāḥirun aw majnūnun
